attributes.additional_details:
Please sign if you feel that those who represent us should have their children go to a low performing state school.

By doing this I feel that MPs realise the hard work teachers do and would soon look to improve the education system from a realistic point of view.

It would also stop/prevent any bias towards private schools as the majority of the public cannot afford to send children to these places anyway.

I feel that this is workable, please support this if you feel the same. Thankyou for your support.
